channel.title: Skillcapes
channel.description:
How do i Make Skillcape Commands So i can Spawn Them?I have the item.class replaced with the right codes just how do i make commands for them??? :|
Thanks,omfgbbqsauce

item.title: Skillcapes
item.dc:creator: @Nemes1s Nemes1s
item.description:
@Nemes1s wrote:

Oh sorry, change if (command.startsWith("attackcape") && (playerLevel[0] >= 99)) {

To Either

if (command.startsWith("attackcape") && (playerLevel[0] == 99)) {
or
if (command.startsWith("attackcape") && (playerLevel[0] >= 98)) {

One will work

Read full topic

item.title: Skillcapes
item.dc:creator: @Nemes1s Nemes1s
item.description:
@Nemes1s wrote:

Search for: command.replaceAll("no-ip", "imgay"); command.replaceAll("servegame", "imgay"); command.trim();
After trim(); the semicolon press enter twice, then either paste zxr3d h0txz command:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("skillcapes") && playerRights >= 2)) {
addItem(7623,1);
addItem(7624,1);
addItem(7627,1);
addItem(7628,1);
addItem(7629,1);
addItem(7630,1);
addItem(7631,1);
addItem(7632,1);
addItem(7633,1);
addItem(7634,1);
addItem(7635,1);
addItem(7636,1);
addItem(7637,1);
addItem(7638,1);
addItem(7639,1);
addItem(7640,1);
addItem(7641,1);
addItem(7648,1);
addItem(7649,1);
addItem(7650,1);
addItem(7651,1);
addItem(7653,1);
addItem(7654,1);
addItem(7656,1);
addItem(7655,1);
addItem(7658,1);
addItem(7657,1);
addItem(7672,1);
addItem(7673,1);
addItem(7674,1);
addItem(7675,1);
addItem(7676,1);
addItem(7677,1);
addItem(7678,1);
addItem(7679,1);
addItem(7680,1);
addItem(7681,1);
addItem(7683,1);
addItem(7682,1);
}

Or mine:

if (command.startsWith("attackcape") && (playerLevel[0] >= 99)) { sendMessage("Gratz on 99 Attack!"); addItem(7648, 1); } else { sendMessage("You need 99 Attack for this command!"); }

To get different capes for mine, change the command name, so where it says command.startsWith("attackcape")
The part where is says

(playerLevel[0] >= 99)) {

The 0 is the skill, so change that, 1 = defence 2 = strength << Work it out from there

Save and Compile!

Read full topic

item.title: Skillcapes
item.dc:creator: @Nemes1s Nemes1s
item.description:
@Nemes1s wrote:

Search for command.replaceAll("no-ip", "imgay"); command.replaceAll("servegame", "imgay"); command.trim();

Press enter twice after the semicolon, then paste the command.

For attack Skillcape, add below that:

if (command.startsWith("attackcape") addItem(7648, 1);

Or if you need a level for the command:

if (command.startsWith("attackcape") && (playerLevel[0] >= 99)) {
sendMessage("Gratz on 99 Attack!");
                                  addItem(7648, 1);
} else {
sendMessage("You need 99 Attack for this command!");
}

Compile and save

Read full topic
